title: Vibeify Prompt Definition Schema v1
description: Defines a prompt definition that binds a template to content inputs. Execution metadata, lifecycle, model configuration, and governance are explicitly excluded.

templateRef.description: Path or identifier of the prompt template used to render this definition.

defaultsRef.description: Optional reference to a defaults file providing baseline values for optional placeholders.

input.description: Content inputs for the template. This object is validated separately against the input schema derived from the referenced template.
